src_text: O tladitse a re, jaanong re na le dipeba tsa dikgwedi tse 4, tse di senang bolwetse jwa sukiri mme di kile tsa bo di na le jone.
ref_text: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
hyp_text: We are aware, however, that the four seasons are no longer as distinct as they used to be, and some people have started to question the concept of winter.

[Tswana]: Le fa go ntse jalo, batho botlhe ba Belgium le Switzerland ba ithutile Sefora se se tlwaelesegileng kwa sekolong, ka jalo ba ka kgona go go tlhaloganya le fa o dirisa mokgwa o o tlwaelesegileng wa go bala ka Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tswana]: Mo makgolong a dingwaga a a fetileng, batho ba ntse ba aga malapana ka manontlhotlho mo mekgokoloseng ya teng, go tsamaela fela le dithabana tse di okament letshitshi la lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tswana]: Diphaephe tsa sekgele sa dimmaele di le 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di ne ya tswala go fetsa ga go tshologa ga dikete tsa di ditanka tsa leokwane kwa borwa jwa Fairbranks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tswana]: Dikarolo tsa segompieno tsa Belgium e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg mo nakong e e fetileng mme ya nna karolo ya Belgium morago ga Phetogo ya kwa Belgium ya bo-1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tswana]: Go tswa tshimologong ya yone, The Onion e itshupile fa e le mankge yo o di gagang kwa pele mo tsa dikgang, e na le kgatiso-kwalo, tsebe ya inthanete e e nnileng le kgogedi ya batho bale 5,000,000 ka kgwedi ya Diphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, dikgang tsa letsatsi lotlhe, dikgatiso tsa lentswe, mme mo bosheng ba ntshitse bukana ya lefatshe e e bidiwang Our Dumb Word.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

ref_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

hyp_text: People who were there said that they saw nothing unusual happen there, except for a few people who were taken away by the police and put in a cell in St. Peter's Square.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Tswana]: Le fa go ntse jalo, batho botlhe ba Belgium le Switzerland ba ithutile Sefora se se tlwaelesegileng kwa sekolong, ka jalo ba ka kgona go go tlhaloganya le fa o dirisa mokgwa o o tlwaelesegileng wa go bala ka Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tswana]: Mo makgolong a dingwaga a a fetileng, batho ba ntse ba aga malapana ka manontlhotlho mo mekgokoloseng ya teng, go tsamaela fela le dithabana tse di okament letshitshi la lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tswana]: Diphaephe tsa sekgele sa dimmaele di le 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di ne ya tswala go fetsa ga go tshologa ga dikete tsa di ditanka tsa leokwane kwa borwa jwa Fairbranks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tswana]: Dikarolo tsa segompieno tsa Belgium e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg mo nakong e e fetileng mme ya nna karolo ya Belgium morago ga Phetogo ya kwa Belgium ya bo-1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tswana]: Go tswa tshimologong ya yone, The Onion e itshupile fa e le mankge yo o di gagang kwa pele mo tsa dikgang, e na le kgatiso-kwalo, tsebe ya inthanete e e nnileng le kgogedi ya batho bale 5,000,000 ka kgwedi ya Diphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, dikgang tsa letsatsi lotlhe, dikgatiso tsa lentswe, mme mo bosheng ba ntshitse bukana ya lefatshe e e bidiwang Our Dumb Word.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Tswana]: Le fa go ntse jalo, batho botlhe ba Belgium le Switzerland ba ithutile Sefora se se tlwaelesegileng kwa sekolong, ka jalo ba ka kgona go go tlhaloganya le fa o dirisa mokgwa o o tlwaelesegileng wa go bala ka Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tswana]: Mo makgolong a dingwaga a a fetileng, batho ba ntse ba aga malapana ka manontlhotlho mo mekgokoloseng ya teng, go tsamaela fela le dithabana tse di okament letshitshi la lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tswana]: Diphaephe tsa sekgele sa dimmaele di le 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di ne ya tswala go fetsa ga go tshologa ga dikete tsa di ditanka tsa leokwane kwa borwa jwa Fairbranks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tswana]: Dikarolo tsa segompieno tsa Belgium e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg mo nakong e e fetileng mme ya nna karolo ya Belgium morago ga Phetogo ya kwa Belgium ya bo-1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tswana]: Go tswa tshimologong ya yone, The Onion e itshupile fa e le mankge yo o di gagang kwa pele mo tsa dikgang, e na le kgatiso-kwalo, tsebe ya inthanete e e nnileng le kgogedi ya batho bale 5,000,000 ka kgwedi ya Diphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, dikgang tsa letsatsi lotlhe, dikgatiso tsa lentswe, mme mo bosheng ba ntshitse bukana ya lefatshe e e bidiwang Our Dumb Word.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Tswana]: Le fa go ntse jalo, batho botlhe ba Belgium le Switzerland ba ithutile Sefora se se tlwaelesegileng kwa sekolong, ka jalo ba ka kgona go go tlhaloganya le fa o dirisa mokgwa o o tlwaelesegileng wa go bala ka Sefora.

[Tswana]: Mo makgolong a dingwaga a a fetileng, batho ba ntse ba aga malapana ka manontlhotlho mo mekgokoloseng ya teng, go tsamaela fela le dithabana tse di okament letshitshi la lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tswana]: Diphaephe tsa sekgele sa dimmaele di le 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di ne ya tswala go fetsa ga go tshologa ga dikete tsa di ditanka tsa leokwane kwa borwa jwa Fairbranks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tswana]: Dikarolo tsa segompieno tsa Belgium e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg mo nakong e e fetileng mme ya nna karolo ya Belgium morago ga Phetogo ya kwa Belgium ya bo-1830.

hyp_text: The H5N1 avian flu virus, which was first detected in poultry in the Lyon region of France, has spread to people, infecting them.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Tswana]: Le fa go ntse jalo, batho botlhe ba Belgium le Switzerland ba ithutile Sefora se se tlwaelesegileng kwa sekolong, ka jalo ba ka kgona go go tlhaloganya le fa o dirisa mokgwa o o tlwaelesegileng wa go bala ka Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tswana]: Mo makgolong a dingwaga a a fetileng, batho ba ntse ba aga malapana ka manontlhotlho mo mekgokoloseng ya teng, go tsamaela fela le dithabana tse di okament letshitshi la lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tswana]: Diphaephe tsa sekgele sa dimmaele di le 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di ne ya tswala go fetsa ga go tshologa ga dikete tsa di ditanka tsa leokwane kwa borwa jwa Fairbranks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tswana]: Dikarolo tsa segompieno tsa Belgium e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg mo nakong e e fetileng mme ya nna karolo ya Belgium morago ga Phetogo ya kwa Belgium ya bo-1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tswana]: Go tswa tshimologong ya yone, The Onion e itshupile fa e le mankge yo o di gagang kwa pele mo tsa dikgang, e na le kgatiso-kwalo, tsebe ya inthanete e e nnileng le kgogedi ya batho bale 5,000,000 ka kgwedi ya Diphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, dikgang tsa letsatsi lotlhe, dikgatiso tsa lentswe, mme mo bosheng ba ntshitse bukana ya lefatshe e e bidiwang Our Dumb Word.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Ka ngwaga wa 1989 o ne a thusa go dira motshameko wa The Simpsons le Brooks le Groening, mme o ne a ikarabelela ka go hira bakwadi ba metshameko ba ntlha.

hyp_text: In 1989, Matt Groening and Sam Simon created The Simpsons, and it was initially pitched to James L. Brooks, who then developed the show.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Tswana]: Le fa go ntse jalo, batho botlhe ba Belgium le Switzerland ba ithutile Sefora se se tlwaelesegileng kwa sekolong, ka jalo ba ka kgona go go tlhaloganya le fa o dirisa mokgwa o o tlwaelesegileng wa go bala ka Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tswana]: Mo makgolong a dingwaga a a fetileng, batho ba ntse ba aga malapana ka manontlhotlho mo mekgokoloseng ya teng, go tsamaela fela le dithabana tse di okament letshitshi la lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tswana]: Diphaephe tsa sekgele sa dimmaele di le 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di ne ya tswala go fetsa ga go tshologa ga dikete tsa di ditanka tsa leokwane kwa borwa jwa Fairbranks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tswana]: Dikarolo tsa segompieno tsa Belgium e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg mo nakong e e fetileng mme ya nna karolo ya Belgium morago ga Phetogo ya kwa Belgium ya bo-1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tswana]: Go tswa tshimologong ya yone, The Onion e itshupile fa e le mankge yo o di gagang kwa pele mo tsa dikgang, e na le kgatiso-kwalo, tsebe ya inthanete e e nnileng le kgogedi ya batho bale 5,000,000 ka kgwedi ya Diphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, dikgang tsa letsatsi lotlhe, dikgatiso tsa lentswe, mme mo bosheng ba ntshitse bukana ya lefatshe e e bidiwang Our Dumb Word.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

Translate the following sentence from Tswana to English:
[Tswana]: Ka ngwaga wa 1989 o ne a thusa go dira motshameko wa The Simpsons le Brooks le Groening, mme o ne a ikarabelela ka go hira bakwadi ba metshameko ba ntlha.

<|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

{"translation": "In 1989, Matt Groening and Sam Simon created The Simpsons, and it was initially pitched to James L. Brooks, who then developed the show."}

[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tswana]: Mo makgolong a dingwaga a a fetileng, batho ba ntse ba aga malapana ka manontlhotlho mo mekgokoloseng ya teng, go tsamaela fela le dithabana tse di okament letshitshi la lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tswana]: Diphaephe tsa sekgele sa dimmaele di le 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di ne ya tswala go fetsa ga go tshologa ga dikete tsa di ditanka tsa leokwane kwa borwa jwa Fairbranks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tswana]: Dikarolo tsa segompieno tsa Belgium e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg mo nakong e e fetileng mme ya nna karolo ya Belgium morago ga Phetogo ya kwa Belgium ya bo-1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tswana]: Go tswa tshimologong ya yone, The Onion e itshupile fa e le mankge yo o di gagang kwa pele mo tsa dikgang, e na le kgatiso-kwalo, tsebe ya inthanete e e nnileng le kgogedi ya batho bale 5,000,000 ka kgwedi ya Diphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, dikgang tsa letsatsi lotlhe, dikgatiso tsa lentswe, mme mo bosheng ba ntshitse bukana ya lefatshe e e bidiwang Our Dumb Word.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Kruger National Park (KNP) e kwa bokone-botlhaba jwa Afrika Borwa mme e iphaphathile le molelwane wa Mozambique ka fa botlhaba, Zimbabwe ka fa bokone, mme molelwane o o ka fa borwa ke Noka ya Crocodile.
ref_text: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River.
hyp_text: Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in northeastern South Africa, bordered by Mozambique to the east, Zimbabwe to the north, and the Crocodile River to the west.

[Tswana]: Le fa go ntse jalo, batho botlhe ba Belgium le Switzerland ba ithutile Sefora se se tlwaelesegileng kwa sekolong, ka jalo ba ka kgona go go tlhaloganya le fa o dirisa mokgwa o o tlwaelesegileng wa go bala ka Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tswana]: Mo makgolong a dingwaga a a fetileng, batho ba ntse ba aga malapana ka manontlhotlho mo mekgokoloseng ya teng, go tsamaela fela le dithabana tse di okament letshitshi la lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tswana]: Diphaephe tsa sekgele sa dimmaele di le 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di ne ya tswala go fetsa ga go tshologa ga dikete tsa di ditanka tsa leokwane kwa borwa jwa Fairbranks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tswana]: Dikarolo tsa segompieno tsa Belgium e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg mo nakong e e fetileng mme ya nna karolo ya Belgium morago ga Phetogo ya kwa Belgium ya bo-1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tswana]: Go tswa tshimologong ya yone, The Onion e itshupile fa e le mankge yo o di gagang kwa pele mo tsa dikgang, e na le kgatiso-kwalo, tsebe ya inthanete e e nnileng le kgogedi ya batho bale 5,000,000 ka kgwedi ya Diphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, dikgang tsa letsatsi lotlhe, dikgatiso tsa lentswe, mme mo bosheng ba ntshitse bukana ya lefatshe e e bidiwang Our Dumb Word.

src_text: Metshameko ya di-Olympiki ya banalebogole e tla simolola Phatwe a le 24 go fitlha Lwetse a le 5. Mengwe ya metshameko e tla tshwarelwa mo mafelong a mangwe go ralala lefatshe la Japane lotlhe.
ref_text: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.
hyp_text: The Olympic Games will start on July 24 and end on August 5. The Olympic Games will also be broadcast in various countries around the world, including Japan.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Tswana]: Le fa go ntse jalo, batho botlhe ba Belgium le Switzerland ba ithutile Sefora se se tlwaelesegileng kwa sekolong, ka jalo ba ka kgona go go tlhaloganya le fa o dirisa mokgwa o o tlwaelesegileng wa go bala ka Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tswana]: Mo makgolong a dingwaga a a fetileng, batho ba ntse ba aga malapana ka manontlhotlho mo mekgokoloseng ya teng, go tsamaela fela le dithabana tse di okament letshitshi la lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tswana]: Diphaephe tsa sekgele sa dimmaele di le 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di ne ya tswala go fetsa ga go tshologa ga dikete tsa di ditanka tsa leokwane kwa borwa jwa Fairbranks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tswana]: Dikarolo tsa segompieno tsa Belgium e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg mo nakong e e fetileng mme ya nna karolo ya Belgium morago ga Phetogo ya kwa Belgium ya bo-1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tswana]: Go tswa tshimologong ya yone, The Onion e itshupile fa e le mankge yo o di gagang kwa pele mo tsa dikgang, e na le kgatiso-kwalo, tsebe ya inthanete e e nnileng le kgogedi ya batho bale 5,000,000 ka kgwedi ya Diphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, dikgang tsa letsatsi lotlhe, dikgatiso tsa lentswe, mme mo bosheng ba ntshitse bukana ya lefatshe e e bidiwang Our Dumb Word.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

Translate the following sentence from Tswana to English:
